actions.query: SELECT [AfterpayPayments].[ID] as ID ,[AfterpayPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[AfterpayPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [AfterpayPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[AfterpayPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,[AfterpayPayments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[AfterpayPayments].[Description] as Description    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[AfterpayPayments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [AfterpayPayments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and AfterpayPayments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [AfterpayPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT [AfterpayPayments].[ID] as ID ,[AfterpayPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[AfterpayPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [AfterpayPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[AfterpayPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,[AfterpayPayments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[AfterpayPayments].[CapturedAmount] as CapturedAmount    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[AfterpayPayments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [AfterpayPayments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and AfterpayPayments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [AfterpayPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT [AfterpayRefunds].[ID] as ID ,[AfterpayRefunds].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[AfterpayRefunds].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [AfterpayRefunds].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[AfterpayRefunds].[Amount] as Amount ,[AfterpayRefunds].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[AfterpayRefunds].[Description] as Description    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[AfterpayRefunds] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [AfterpayRefunds].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and [AfterpayRefunds].[GPaymentID] =@TRXID and  [AfterpayRefunds].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT AR.ID AS RefundID, AR.GPaymentID AS RefundPaymentID, AR.MerchantID AS RefundMerchantID, AR.Amount AS RefundAmount, AP.Amount as PaymentAmount, AP.AvailableAmount as PaymentAvailableAmount, PaymentStateDefs.Name AS RefundStatus FROM AfterpayPayments AS AP CROSS JOIN PaymentStateDefs INNER JOIN AfterpayRefunds AS AR ON AP.GPaymentID = AR.InitialTransactionID AND PaymentStateDefs.PaymentStateDefID = AR.PaymentStateDefID WHERE AR.GPaymentID= @TRXID AND AR.MerchantID= @MID
